DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to evaluate the use of sunlight instead of red light during photodynamic therapy of actinic keratoses using methyl aminolevulinate
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Actinic Keratoses With Photodynamic Therapy Using Sunlight Versus Red Light
DOC.criteria: symmetric actinic keratoses in scalp or face porphyria, pregnancy, breast feeding
